00195 typedef struct wcb           /* Window control block                     */
00196 {                            /* ---------------------------------------- */
00197   int wx1,wy1,wx2,wy2,       /* Coordinates of border of window          */
00198       x1,y1,x2,y2,           /* Coordinates of writable part of window   */
00199       xsize,                 /* width of window - inclusive border       */
00200       ysize,                 /* height of window -inclusive border       */
00201       ccx, ccy,              /* Screen cursor pos in window              */
00202       wcolor,                /* window color                             */
00203       bcolor,                /* border color                             */
00204       btype;                 /* _NO_BORDER,_SINGLE_LINE etc              */
00205   char *scrnsave;            /* pointer to screen save buffer            */
00206   int  synflg;               /* cursor sync flag                         */
00207   struct wcb *prev;          /* linked list - previous window            */
00208   struct wcb *next;          /* linked list - next window                */
00209   int  scroll_ok;            /* Scroll ok flag                           */
00210   int  flag;                 /* SHADOWED                                 */
00211   char *title;               /* Pointer to title                         */
00212   int  monitor;              /* FIRST, SECOND                            */
00213   int  page;                 /* Page window is in                        */
00214   int  hideflag;             /* Flag indicating if window is hidden      */
00215   int  level;                /* Level of window on desktop               */
00216 }
00217 WINDOW, *WINDOWPTR;

00254 #ifndef max
00255 #define max(a,b) (((a) > (b)) ? (a) : (b))
00256 #endif
00257 #ifndef min
00258 #define min(a,b) (((a) < (b)) ? (a) : (b))
00259 #endif
00260 #ifndef minmax
00261 #define minmax(a,b,c)  (max((a),( (min((b),(c))) )))
00262 #endif

00398 #ifdef MAIN_WINDOW_MODULE

00400 /*-----------------------------------------
00401    Mask colors with 0x7F to avoid blinking
00402    when working with monochrome monitor
00403 ------------------------------------------*/
00404 int    _menu_att       = (16*WHITE+BLACK)    & 0x7F,  /* memu item            */
00405        _menu_hotkey    = (16*WHITE+RED)      & 0x7F,  /* hotkey of item       */
00406        _menu_highlight = (16*BLACK+WHITE)    & 0x7F,  /* highlighted item     */
00407        _window_att     = (16*BLACK+WHITE)    & 0x7F,  /* window attribute     */
00408        _border_att     = (16*WHITE+BLACK)    & 0x7F,  /* border               */
00409        _error_att      = (16*RED+YELLOW)     & 0x7F,  /* Error window         */
00410        _disabled_att   = (16*WHITE+RED)      & 0x7F,  /* DISABLED item        */
00411        _comment_att    = (16*WHITE+BLUE)     & 0x7F,  /* COMMENT item         */
00412        _dialog_att     = (16*WHITE+BLACK)    & 0x7F,  /* Dialog menu          */
00413        _desktop_att    = (16*BLUE+YELLOW)    & 0x7F,  /* Dialog menu          */
00414        _help_text      = (16*WHITE+BLACK)    & 0x7F,  /* help text            */
00415        _help_bold      = (16*WHITE+RED)      & 0x7F,  /* bold help text       */
00416        _help_border    = (16*WHITE+BLACK)    & 0x7F,  /* help border          */
00417        _help_topiclink = (16*WHITE+LIGHTBLUE)& 0x7F,  /* topic link text      */
00418        _help_linkselect= (16*WHITE+RED)      & 0x7F;  /* selected topic link  */
